title: Tenth Bethel-Cleveland Clinic Epilepsy International Symposium: Comprehensive Care for People with Epilepsy
abstract: The 10th Bethel-Cleveland Clinic Epilepsy International Symposium, on Comprehensive Care for People with Epilepsy will be held in Bielefeld, Germany, 14–18 April 1999. For information and further details, please contact Mrs Ines Petzold, Epilepsie-Zentrum Bethel, Klinik Kidron, Maraweg 25, D-33617 Bielefeld, Germany. Telephone: +49 521 144 3152 – Fax: +49 521 144 3458.
